arts.ttl: Hearts can forget Celtic and Rangers challenge with supercomputer plan as focus is avoiding the DROP - Ryan Stevenson
arts.sum: Tynecastle chief Andrew McKinlay revealed his hopes for the Jambos new analytics tool this week - but Hearts hero Stevenson reckons there's far more pressing issues staring his old side in the face.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers insists that Premier Sports deal snub by Celtic is 'reward' for fans despite Aberdeen TV blackout
arts.sum: The Scottish champions ran out 3-2 winners in the friendly clash with Sligo Rovers

arts.ttl: Paul Tisdale 'targeted' for senior Celtic role as self proclaimed 'football doctor' in line to fill Mark Lawwell void
arts.sum: The former exeter and Stevenage boss is working as a consultant and has previously advised Crystal Palace and Fulham

arts.ttl: Luis Palma saves Celtic from Sligo embarrassment as Brendan Rodgers left with creeping fringe men issue – 5 talking points
arts.sum: The winger netted a hat-trick as the Hoops ran out 3-2 winners in Ireland

arts.ttl: Celtic hero Kyogo Furuhashi sends heartfelt message to Andres Iniesta
arts.sum: Celtic hero Kyogo Furuhashi sent a message to Barcelona legend Andres Iniesta this morning after the Spaniard announced his retirement from football. The Celtic striker played alongside Iniesta for 111 games before he made the move to Glasgow but it is clear from this message, he enjoyed a close bond with his former teammate.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Celtic team news vs Sligo Rovers as fringe players handed chance to shine
arts.sum: Get the latest news sent straight to your messages by joining our Celtic WhatsApp community today. All you have to do is click here if you're on mobile, select 'Join Community' and you're in!

arts.ttl: Celtic's move to protect fans' best interests cannot be faulted after Premier Sports opt-out
arts.sum: Following recent developments, Celtic have now declined the Premier Sports TV option, which would have seen the club earn a maximum of £150,000 if two home Scottish Premiership matches were aired via the broadcaster. Celtic’s upcoming Scottish Premiership top-two showdown against Aberdeen looks set not to be broadcast on television next Saturday after the club opted out of Premier Sports’ SPFL contract.

arts.ttl: Sligo Rovers 0 Celtic 0 LIVE goal updates from the friendly showdown in Ireland
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers takes his players who are not involved in international duty to the birthplace of Brother Walfrid

arts.ttl: Premiership club CEO explains why he 'genuinely' sees a chance to fight Celtic for future titles
arts.sum: Per The Edinburgh Evening News, McKinley has cited the near completion of an investment deal involving Hearts and Brighton & Hove Albion chairman Tony Bloom as a potential route to challenging Celtic for future Scottish Premiership titles, with a heavy focus on recruitment via analytics. Andrew McKinley on fighting Celtic for Scottish Premiership title

arts.ttl: Kolo Toure reveals Brendan Rodgers advice to former Celtic coach as he stays ready after false start in the dugout
arts.sum: Toure was given his first coaching job by Rodgers but remains out of work after disastrous short Wigan spell
